briefdescription.para: Outputs the data inside node to out.

parameterdescription.para: The type of data which the node contains. Used for template parameters of TreeNode.
The std::ostream & to output the content of node to.
The TreeNode<ValueType> whose content needs to be written to out.

simplesect.para: out after outputting content to it.

detaileddescription.para:
ValueType
The type of data which the nodes of tree contain. Used for template parameters of Tree.
out
The std::ostream & to output the content of tree to.
tree
The Tree<ValueType> whose content needs to be written to out.
out after outputting content to it.
Example - For the following tree,
Here, nodes inside [] mean they have the same parent.
